settings.title: Now, as part of the promotion, we are offering free Fender Set and a Rear Rack, a total value of $158.

settings.text:
• Contact Email: support@jasionbike.com
  • Contact Phone：(+1) 888-825-6366
  • Back to School Sale: If you order a bike from Aug 2 to Aug 15, please contact support@jasionbike.com to claim a free rear basket after receiving your bike.

    *Please note that this offer cannot be combined with other promotions.

*Shipping Announcement
1. Exciting news! The black JASION X-Hunter has arrived! The JASION X-Hunter in black will be shipped to all customers on January 29th. Other colors of the JASION X-Hunter are expected to ship by February 6th. Thank you very much for your patience.
2. In response to the previous shortage of JASION X-Hunter, JASION launched an event on December 6th, 2023. For customers who purchased X-Hunter electric bicycles after December 6th, 2023 and have not received the goods, we have launched two compensation measures (select one, this offer cannot be shared with other offers):
- Every X-Hunter e-bike purchased now comes with 2 additional baskets as compensation.
- Get a $50 refund per bike.
If you participated in this event, please contact us at support@jasionbike.com after receiving your X-Hunter and let us know which compensation option you prefer.
3. This compensation event is for customers who purchased between December 6th, 2023 and February 6th, 2024. Please note that opportunities to participate in this event are limited! Users who are interested in participating in this event should act quickly! After the event ends, you will no longer be able to enjoy these two compensation measures!
Thank you for your continued support and understanding of JASION!

settings.content_1: Embrace the new era of commuting! This combo is the perfect choice for urban commuting. The powerful motor performance and dual suspension design of the X-Hunter provide a smoother riding experience. The low frame design of the EB7 ST offers a convenient riding experience. This combo combines the stability and durability of these 2 ebikes, making them effortlessly handle crowded city streets and suburban lanes, injecting new vitality into your commuting life!
settings.content_2: All Jasion bikes are covered under our manufacturer's 1-year all-inclusive warranty for the original owner against all manufacturing defects (All free Accessories are not covered by warranty service).
settings.content_3:
For non-quality issues, customer may ask for product replacement or return within 14 days after receiving it. The customer is responsible for the return shipping cost of $180. Jasion will provide a return shipping label, and the designated carrier will collect the return package.
*Click HERE to get more information.

settings.text: Introduction to the X-Hunter Parts Exploded View

settings.content: Use this text to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.title: Feature name
settings.content: Share useful information about your product features.

settings.title: The speed for each PAS level of Jasion® X-Hunter
settings.content: PAS1 Top speed 16mph，PAS2 Top speed 18mph，PAS3 Top speed 20mph，PAS4 Top speed 23mph，PAS5 Top speed 30+mph

settings.title: Jasion EB7 2.0 - Explore the Urban Landscape
settings.content: This uniquely designed electric bike boasts a powerful 850W motor, 20"x3"" wide tires, and dual shock absorbers, providing you with a smooth and powerful riding experience.

settings.text_main: Jasion® EB7 2.0 Fat Tire Folding Electric Bike
settings.text_sub: Jasion EB7 all-terrain electric bike is an affordable e-bike. A sustained 500W brushless geared hub motor allows you to ride freely through the city blocks and dirt roads just like the breeze. 55 miles on a single charge, 20'' × 3.0'' Fat Tires, and double shock absorption, all for safer and smoother cycling.

settings.title: Equipped with a Powerful 1400W Motor
settings.content: Delivering 90 Nm of torque within just 2 seconds in the 5-speed setting. The motor, designed with a sine wave structure, allows you to effortlessly control your riding speed across gears 1 to 5, providing a customizable and intuitive riding experience，JasionBike rear hub motor has obtained international certification according to ISO 2849 standards.

settings.title: Equipped with a Powerful 1400W Motor
settings.content: Delivering 90 Nm of torque within just 2 seconds in the 5-speed setting. The motor, designed with a sine wave structure, allows you to effortlessly control your riding speed across gears 1 to 5, providing a customizable and intuitive riding experience.

settings.title: Samsung/LG 48V13A Battery
settings.content: Utilizing the newly developed 18650 battery cells from Samsung SDI, each lithium-ion single cell measures 18mm in diameter and 65mm in length, combining to form a 48V13A configuration. Jasion Bike incorporates a quick-detachable sealed design achieving an IPX-6 waterproof rating. The battery is removable for charging and holds UL 2271 international certification.

settings.title: 48V13A Battery by Samsung
settings.content: Utilizing Samsung SDI's newly developed 21750 cells, each lithium-ion cell has a diameter of 21 millimeters and a length of 75 millimeters, forming a 48V13A configuration. The 21750 battery cell capacity is increased by 35%, and its volume energy density is nearly 20% higher than the original 18650 cells. Jasion Bike employs a quick-detach sealed design for the battery, with multiple layers of protective sheathing achieving an IPX-6 waterproof rating. The battery features removable charging.

settings.title: Full Suspension System for Ebike
settings.content: X-Hunter employs a front fork with manually adjustable shock absorption and a four-link mechanism to achieve a high-intensity suspension effect for the entire bike. The multi-link suspension configuration enables integrated dissipation of forces, allowing X-Hunter to bear a load capacity of up to 480 pounds. Whether navigating snowy terrain, rough surfaces, or mountain trails, it provides a stable and comfortable riding experience.

settings.title: Multi-Stage Disassembly
settings.content: Jasion Bike takes pride in its cutting-edge quick multi-stage disassembly design. With no need for cumbersome tools, just a few simple steps allow for the rapid disassembly of various components, ensuring easy portability and storage.

settings.title: Big Bike Saddle Cushion
settings.content: X-Hunter saddle features a dual shock absorption structure, with dimensions measuring 11 inches in length, 10 inches in width, and 3.15 inches in height, ensuring prolonged comfort during rides.

settings.title: 20" x 4" Puncture-Resistant Tires
settings.content: The high-quality fat tires provide extra protection against punctures from thorns, glass, and other small materials.

settings.title: Full Suspension System for the Entire Bike
settings.content: Equipped with front fork shock absorption and a four-link shock absorption system, achieving a full bike suspension system. It absorbs most of the jarring bumps and vibrations during rides, providing a comfortable riding experience.

settings.title: Headlight&Taillight
settings.content: Brighter LED headlights, make riding more convenient and safer. The integrated taillight will flash when brake, making it a warning light at night.

settings.title: Shimano 7-Speed & Motorcycle-Style Hand-Twist Throttle
settings.content: The Shimano 7-Speed gear shifter makes your ride smoother, and the motorcycle-style hand-twist throttle allows for easy control of the electric bike's speed

settings.title: Foldable Electric Bike
settings.content: The foldable and portable design makes the X-Hunter e-bike easy to carry and fits stock into any compact space, such as an apartment, subway, or car trunk.Folding Size: 29.5"*33.5"*15.7"(Inch)

settings.title: Dual Disc Brake System
settings.content: The sensitive brake system with the front and rear 160mm disc rotors can provide sufficient braking force at a short distance whether in wet or dry conditions.

settings.title: The Main Features
settings.content: "More detailed feature introduction for the X-Hunter Electric Bicycle."

settings.item13: Rear Light  Left and Right Turn Signal Brake Lights
Rear Light  Left and Right Turn Signal Brake Lights

settings.title: What's your shipping policy?
settings.content:
Jasion has suspended local pick-up services in the United States. If pick-up services are resumed, we will update the information on our website. Please check the website for updates.

We provide UPS, USPS, and FedEx shipping services. No tax is needed. We DO NOT ship to PO BOXES.

In-stock orders typically ship within 2 business days, unless otherwise noted on the product page. Please allow 5-7 business days for your shipment to arrive at your address. Any delivery dates provided by JASION are estimates.

For more shipping information, send an email to support@Jasionbike.com. We will get back to you in 24 hours.

Want to know more about shipping policies, please check more details on our Shipping Policy Page.

settings.title: What's your warranty policy?
settings.content:
All JASION bikes carry a one(1) year warranty from the date of receipt of the bike for manufacturing defects in materials and/or workmanship( all free accessories are not covered).

We will replace any component that is defective or damaged in materials and/or workmanship( including the damage in the processing of shipment).

Before making a warranty claim, we suggest that you first contact us at support@jasionbike.com.

Want to know more about warranty policies, please check more details on our Warranty Policy Page.

settings.title: What's your return&refund policy?
settings.content:
We provide exchange service within 14 days. If the product is defective or damaged, Send damaged photos or videos to customer service within 14 days after receiving the goods, and the damaged parts can be replaced or compensated. We will cover the return (exchange) shipping costs.

In the case of non-quality returns, the customer will be responsible for the return shipping costs.

You can always contact us for any return questions at support@jasionbike.com.

Want to know more about return and refound policies, please check more details on our Return&Refund Policy Page.

settings.title: Do you support US local pickup?
settings.content:
Certainly! Please check the warehouse information here.(Address: ①RIA 2380 W Baseline Road Dock Door #3, Rialto, CA 92376Time: Mon-Fri 7:00-15:00 ②DAO_CA_US 1001 South Doubleday Ave, DOCK#19, Ontario, CA 91761).

If you choose to pick it up, please pick it up from the warehouse within two days since you receive BOL, or the order will be voided. You will need to pay the warehouse placement fee, which is ten dollars per ebike per day.

settings.title: Does my height suit these 2 bikes?
settings.content:
X-Hunter recommended rider height is 5'3" to 6'4".

EB7 ST recommended rider height is 4'5" to 6'2".

settings.title: I ordered two items, why I have received only one?
settings.content: Because the shipment weight is overweight, we usually ship them separately. So both reach at different day and time. Please don’t panic and just keep tracking the item in your orders window or your email. If you still can not find it please contact us.

settings.title: Does my Jasion ebike come pre-assembled?
settings.content: Your e-bike arrives 85% assembled. There are just a few pieces to put into place once you take the bike out of the box. For unboxing and setup instructions, please follow the guides on our YouTube Channel.

settings.title_video: Instructions for Key Usage and Battery RemovalSummarize

settings.title: Assembly Video-Quick and Painless Setup
settings.content: Dive into the world of electric biking with our easy-to-follow installation video. In just a few simple steps, you'll have your bike assembled and ready for the road. No hassle, no stress—just seamless setup for an instant riding experience.
settings.author: Jasion Bike

settings.title: Effortless Installation-Assembly Video
settings.content: Enjoy the excitement of electric biking without the headache of complicated assembly. Our installation video streamlines the process, making it a breeze for riders of all levels. Ensures you spend more time riding and less time assembling.
settings.author: Jasion Bike

settings.title: Jasion X-Hunter Ebike Review ~ A Full Suspension electric bike at a decent price!
settings.content: The Jasion X-Hunter is a 4in fat tire ebike with a 22 amp controller, 13 amp hour battery, and a dual suspension system. I test the bike's power, speed, and brakes by riding up hills and going down steep inclines. The bike costs $939 with free shipping and it's worth buying.
settings.author: Jeremiah Mcintosh

settings.title: Returning Home to Amish Country Pennsylvania (and Gifting My Parents a Jasion E-Bike!)
settings.content: We were gifted a Jasion E-bike which was perfect timing! Jasion EB7 ST is great as the seat goes very low for my mom and it also folds in half so it's easy to transport in the back of a car. It was the first time any of us tried an e-bike so we had a great time driving!
settings.author: Chris Crossed
